channel.title: Project Modern Scape
channel.description:
Hi, I am looking to making a team to make a successful server I have had server run by my self but since I couldn't host it went downhill because the hosters I had weren't very good like quit so I did not have up to date files ect but if i have a team that I could trust the server would be sucessful its called Modern Scape and its a server designed to be how people like it not over crowded and all that stuff.
Base - Delta (Don't let that put you off until you see the server)
What people i would want for the team...
Server Coders : To help code server a little - I do a lot of server coding my self.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Client Coders : Id like someone who knows quite a bit of client codes and could make a really good client.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Advertisers : Well this sounds like a easy job, but I don't want someone who just will not do any work because Advertisers are important i do not expect you to pay for ad banners i expect you to set-up Modern Scape on vote sites ect and to Advertise in other ways you can think of too.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Website Coder : This does not matter too much but if there's any that would like to do this job then that would be fine as long as you know what your doing.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hoster : As I mentioned earlier I cannot host no more my self so I need a trusty, loyal and friendly hoster that can keep server uptime high.
If you take one of these jobs alls i can give you is a place in the staff, but if we have a team it will be successful and we will have players and then we could maybe get more serious with the server.
Founder Of Team : Me Server Developer : --- Client Developer : --- Client Developer : --- Advertiser : --- Advertiser : --- Hoster : ---
Please Post here or contact my email at Carz_BBB@hotmail.co.uk or go to my old Server website www.ModernScape.co.nr and post on forums there...
Thanks for listening hope you join...

item.title: Project Modern Scape
item.dc:creator: @brendan_pk0 brendan pk0
item.description:
@brendan_pk0 wrote:

Hi, I am looking to making a team to make a successful server I have had server run by my self but since I couldn’t host it went downhill because the hosters I had weren’t very good like quit so I did not have up to date files ect but if i have a team that I could trust the server would be sucessful its called Modern Scape and its a server designed to be how people like it not over crowded and all that stuff.

Base - Delta (Don’t let that put you off until you see the server)

What people i would want for the team…

Server Coders : To help code server a little - I do a lot of server coding my self.

Client Coders : Id like someone who knows quite a bit of client codes and could make a really good client.

Advertisers : Well this sounds like a easy job, but I don’t want someone who just will not do any work because Advertisers are important i do not expect you to pay for ad banners i expect you to set-up Modern Scape on vote sites ect and to Advertise in other ways you can think of too.

Website Coder : This does not matter too much but if there’s any that would like to do this job then that would be fine as long as you know what your doing.

Hoster : As I mentioned earlier I cannot host no more my self so I need a trusty, loyal and friendly hoster that can keep server uptime high.

If you take one of these jobs alls i can give you is a place in the staff, but if we have a team it will be successful and we will have players and then we could maybe get more serious with the server.

Founder Of Team : Me
Server Developer : —
Client Developer : —
Client Developer : —
Advertiser : —
Advertiser : —
Hoster : —

Please Post here or contact my email at Carz_BBB@hotmail.co.uk or go to my old Server website www.ModernScape.co.nr and post on forums there…

Thanks for listening hope you join…
